attributes.comment:
adoptive parents awaiting the arrival of a child are one of this world's gifts. They
already incur an exorbitant expense imposed on them by international
organizations and governments. To have their own government increase its fees
greater than 100% is figuratively the 'knife in the back.' When did this country
become so uncaring and unfeeling for its own......we rush to all parts of the world
in the name of compassion.....we send our children to bleed for them. Why must
the government now act in such a manner as to punish good people for the 'sin' of
wanting to love and provide stablility for a child who was abandonded????????????
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Alicia Lippert
